actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the "85-15" rule does not apply to courses which lead to a standard college degree.

summary.text: Exempts courses which lead to a standard college degree from the "85-15" rule under which the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs is required to disapprove enrollment of any eligible veteran, not already enrolled, in any course where more than 85 percent of the students enrolled have their fees paid by either the Federal Government or the educational institution itself.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the "85-15" rule does not apply to courses which lead to a standard college degree.
